directions.step:
Combine wild rice, water, and salt in steaming pan; cover and steam until done, about 45 minutes. Add butter; fluff with fork before serving.
Variation: Mix steamed wild rice with sauteed mushrooms and fresh herbs.
NOTES : Especially good with game or poultry.
Recipe by: The Ultimate Rice Cooker Cookbook by Betty L. Torre
